name: Having a HARD Time
description:
HARD Times Are Coming


You're just an ordinary girl and a sophomore at Wentford University, majoring in Chemistry alongside your life-long best friend. You've been living a fairly carefree life until one day an after class science experiment turns into a freak accident, changing your life as you know it. You're no longer just a girl... you're more than that... much more.



How will you deal with the cards that life has dealt you? How do you respond to these newfound difficulties? And how will your relationships with those around you change from now on? Come and decide for yourself.

Can you handle it?


Get to know the large and diverse cast of characters. Will you be able to figure out the secrets behind their smiles?

Or do you give in to desire?


Surrounded by all these beautiful ladies and gifted with a special tool, how could you possibly resist?
